thread.title: Phir Aayi Hasseen Dillruba teaser out: Taapsee Pannu, Vikrant Massey return in tale of love and deception
thread.title_full: Phir Aayi Hasseen Dillruba teaser out: Taapsee Pannu, Vikrant Massey return in tale of love and deception

author: @Dailyhuntapp
title: Phir Aayi Hasseen Dillruba teaser out: Taapsee Pannu, Vikrant Massey return in tale of love and deception
text:
MUMBAI: The teaser for the much-awaited film Phir Aayi Hasseen Dillruba has finally been unveiled, reintroducing audiences to the captivating world of love and deception. Starring Taapsee Pannu, Vikrant Massey, Sunny Kaushal, and Jimmy Shergill, the film serves as a sequel to the popular romantic thriller Haseen Dillruba.
Released on February 29, the 52-second teaser offers a tantalizing glimpse into the narrative, set against the iconic backdrop of the song "Ek Hasina Thi". Taapsee Pannu reprises her role as Rani, while Vikrant Massey returns as Rishu, also known as Ravi Varma. Joining them are Sunny Kaushal as Abhimanyu and Jimmy Shergill as Mrityunjay, adding depth to this intriguing tale.
Set in the city of Agra, the story follows Rani and Rishu as they navigate through challenges, including a broken barrage, heavy floods, and unexpected crocodile sightings in the Yamuna River, all while attempting to evade authorities and plan their escape for a happily ever after.
Expressing their excitement for the sequel, the creators of Phir Aayi Hasseen Dillruba stated, "We're thrilled to embark on another exhilarating chapter of romance and suspense with Phir Aayi Hasseen Dillruba!" They thanked fans for the love shown to the first part and promised that the romance and thrill are far from over.
Directed by Jayprad Desai and written by Kanika Dhillon, Phir Aayi Hasseen Dillruba promises to be a gripping tale of love, betrayal, and mystery. The film is set to premiere soon on Netflix, offering audiences another thrilling cinematic experience.
Stay tuned to Tellychakkar.com for more entertainment updates.
Credit: Pinkvilla
DISCLAIMER: WE ARE NOT TARGETING ANY ACTOR. WE ARE ONLY FOLLOWING THE TRACK OF THE SHOW AND THE CHARACTER.
